rows.label: qev070202_MSG0001
rows.name: Wup, wup? Heeeey, it's you, kid! You finally got here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0002
rows.name:
Now I can finally say good-bye to roughing it like
some kind of Neanderthal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0003
rows.name:
I've been living a novel existence since the day I took
off in my Miramobile, let me tell you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what Professor B is doing here.

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0020
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0021
rows.name:
Express admiration for Professor B
surviving in the wild for so long.

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0004
rows.name:
Okay, so I DID cross the &a3*«%z threshold.
That's like 99 percent of time travel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0005
rows.name:
But after that, I got thrown back into this time period.
Almost as if something was blocking my way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0006
rows.name:
It's been no picnic, let me tell you—I got thrown here
when my time travel attempt failed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0007
rows.name:
I've been living off primordial creature meat ever since.
...Blech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0008
rows.name:
My Miramobile was intact, at least, so I haven't had
to worry about being rained on. Still, it's been quite
a rustic experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'm sure you have many more questions where that one
came from, kid, but would you mind dealing with these
damn idiots that are surrounding us first?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0010
rows.name:
...What, you didn't notice them, kid? Tsk tsk!
It seems pretty clear they followed you here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0011
rows.name:
They're probably Gadd's goons.
You remember? That human who attacked you?
He seemed awfully eager to pay me a visit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'll be reclining in my Miramobile in the meantime.
Let me know when you've mopped them up,
would you? Thanks, kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0031
rows.name: Give a confident nod in response.

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask why Professor B doesn't help you fight.

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0013
rows.name: Professional as ever! I'm sure you've got it well in hand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0014
rows.name:
Sadly, I haven't been able to recharge my trusty
$@?ºº# blaster after all the primordial creature
hunting I've been doing. Sucker's out of juice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0015
rows.name: But come on—this is child's play for a pro like you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0016
rows.name: Just let me know when you're ready to go, kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0017
rows.name: All set?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0018
rows.name:
Not that the likes of Gadd will give you any trouble,
am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0051
rows.name: Assure Professor B that you've got this.

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0060
rows.name: Wait

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Professor B that you still need a minute.

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0019
rows.name: Happy hunting, then![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0020
rows.name:
...Hey, Gadd! How long are you planning to play
hide-and-seek, precisely?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0021
rows.name:
You won't get your grubby mitts on my tech by hiding,
you know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0022
rows.name:
...Tch. You up and disappeared on me, and now I find
you've been camping out here this whole time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0023
rows.name:
Well, vacation's over, Professor. Now all that's left is
figuring out what happens next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0024
rows.name:
Tell you what—why don't we let your little guard dog
there decide how this goes down?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0025
rows.name:
Will it be: A) You hand the professor over quietly,
nobody gets hurt, and we live happily ever after?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0026
rows.name:
Or B) You resist like an idiot, I kill you anyway,
then I scrape out the good professor's brains and take
what's inside?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0027
rows.name:
Choice is all yours, pal. I got no complaints,
so long as I get what I'm after.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0070
rows.name: Surrender

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0071
rows.name:
Tell Gadd that you give up, so long as
he promises not to hurt Professor B.

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0080
rows.name: Fight

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0081
rows.name:
Tell Gadd that you're going to
finish this once and for all.

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0028
rows.name:
Of all the... How a«p%*8o can you be?!
Nobody's THAT gullible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0029
rows.name:
You really think they're the type to keep a promise?
Just get fighting already, kid![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0030
rows.name:
And here we were having such a nice conversation.
Looks like I'll have to murder you after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0031
rows.name:
If I had a credit for every time I hear that one...
Tragic how none of 'em realize till it's too late.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0032
rows.name:
You can see it in their eyes as they're lying there
bleeding out: "I shoulda...gone with...choice A..."
Ah, well. What're you gonna do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0033
rows.name:
Looks like they're waiting for you to make the first
move, kid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0034
rows.name:
Make sure you're well prepared, then go put those
punks down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0035
rows.name:
...Damn idiots. I can only imagine the scientist that
would use that lot as hired goons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0036
rows.name:
Even if they did get their hands on my knowledge,
it'd take them centuries to make any sense of it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0037
rows.name:
They can't see an inch past their own blasted noses.
Science is all about keeping your eyes a hundred paces
down the road as you work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0038
rows.name:
The moment they start spending time stealing others'
work instead of doing their own, it's a lost cause. Bah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0091
rows.name: Concur with Professor B's assessment.

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0100
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0101
rows.name: Argue with Professor B.

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0039
rows.name:
Although...there ARE those in this era working to
author their own new chapter in history.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0040
rows.name:
Veven's one of them, despite all his inexperience.
The future I come from was built in part by such folks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0041
rows.name:
So I've got to do what I can as well. And to do that,
I need to get back to NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0042
rows.name:
Wup, wup! You've got sympathy even for their kind,
kid?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0043
rows.name:
Well, I'll grant you that peer emulation can be a valid
form of scientific inquiry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0044
rows.name:
But if you let mimicry become a habit without creating
anything original from it, you're only asking to get
culled at some point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0045
rows.name:
But that's enough talk out of me. It's time we got the
Miramobile back to New LA so I can practice what I
preach.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0046
rows.name:
Er, but could you possibly gather some blast chard
from around here in Oblivia, kid? We need it to fuel
the Miramobile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0047
rows.name:
Hmm, the n%%*x*« appeared properly,
and the a••*%$k completely disappeared as well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0048
rows.name:
At that point, the time leap should basically have
been guaranteed. Sure enough, this planet must be
#*3::u%$j5±...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0049
rows.name: Hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0050
rows.name:
Think you can get me that blast chard, kid? I need it to
fuel the Miramobile and get her back to the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0051
rows.name:
Can't get on with my work until I've got a proper lab
to work in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0052
rows.name:
Get your hands on that fuel? Once the tank's full,
I can have my Miramobile back to New LA in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0053
rows.name:
That should be more than enough to get this sucker
back. Next stop, New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0054
rows.name:
See you back at the lab, kid! ...Oh, and I've got
another big project I'll need your help with, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0110
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0111
rows.name: Smile and tell Professor B to drive safe.

rows.label: qev070202_JNK0120
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev070202_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask what this important new research is.

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0055
rows.name:
Ha! Good old [ST:playername ],
as thoughtful as ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0056
rows.name:
But I'm folding space-time here, kid.
Traffic jams and fender-benders are for commoners.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0057
rows.name: I'll be back in New LA on a faster-than-light c&»‹*![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0058
rows.name:
Curious as ever, I see. You actually remind me of me.
Have I ever mentioned that, kid?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0059
rows.name:
Well, I'm going to get to the bottom of the mystery
surrounding this planet. This isn't just about getting
back to my time anymore—it is a test![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0060
rows.name:
The gods of science have thrown down the gauntlet,
and I'll meet their challenge no matter what.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070202_MSG0061
rows.name: All right, here we go. Miramobiiiiiiiileeeee...LAUNCH![ST:wait ]
